    • Uses of RaspberryService.RaspberryNotFoundException in at.qe.timeguess.services

      Methods in at.qe.timeguess.services that throw RaspberryService.RaspberryNotFoundException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Game LobbyService.createGame(int maxPoints, int numberOfTeams, Category category, Dice dice, String raspberryId)
      Creates a game with the currently logged in user as host, a randomly generated gamecode and the given dice mapping and adds it to the runningGames index.
      Game LobbyService.createGame(int maxPoints, int numberOfTeams, Category category, String raspberryId)
      Creates a game with the currently logged in user as host, a randomly generated gamecode and the default dice mapping and adds it to the runningGames index.
      void RaspberryService.registerGame(String raspberryID, Game game)
      Method that registers a game for a given raspberry id.
      void RaspberryService.updateDice(String raspberryId, int update)
      Calls the diceUpdate method on the game that is registered for the given raspberry.
      void RaspberryService.updateDiceBatteryStatus(String raspberryId, int batteryStatus)
      Method that updates the batteryStatus of a Dice if a game is registered to it.
      boolean RaspberryService.updateDiceConnectionStatus(String raspberryId, boolean connectionStatus)
      Method that updates the connectionStatus of a Dice if a game is registered to it.
